data.title: Sided Cat Scratch Deterrent Tape
data.meta_description: With FindTape Cat Scratch Deterrent Tape, cats are discouraged from scratching. This double-sided, transparent tape applies in an instant, and stops your feline friend from scratch
data.text:
Product Description

The FindTape Cat Scratch Deterrent Tape is your cat clawing at your couch? Is your kitten sharpening their claws on your counter? Are you looking for a spray-free way to protect your furniture and train your cat? This transparent double-sided tape is “su-purr” easy to apply and remove. This product features a silicone adhesive that is not only tough, but is hypoallergenic, so it won’t harm your feline friend or your furniture. It also won’t leave behind any sticky residue.* Simply peel and stick in the places that are being clawed at by your kitty.

Protect your furniture, window screens, curtains, chair legs, and carpets from scratching and jumping. A few strips on your counter will quickly train your cat from jumping up, and will help keep your kitchen hygienic. The sticky surface deters your cat from touching or scratching the area. Don’t wait until your sofa corner is shredded. Start training your cat today with FindTape Cat Scratch Deterrent Tape!

*We always recommend testing first on a small, inconspicuous section of fabric to ensure the tape removes as desired.

Features & Benefits

This double-sided, transparent tape applies in an instant, and stops your feline friend from scratching your furniture.

Simply peel and stick in the places that are being clawed at by your kitty. The sticky surface will deter your cat from scratching the area.

A few strips on your counter will quickly train your cat from jumping up and will help keep your kitchen hygienic.

Protect your furniture, window screens, curtains, chair legs, and carpets from scratching and jumping.

Features a silicone adhesive that is not only tough, but hypoallergenic, so it won’t harm your feline friend or your furniture.

* Multiple cases may be shipped per package in order to minimize the charge for shipping.
